post.summary: Create a seller listing for a requested event
post.description: Creates a seller listing for an event requested by the current user.
Creates a preview of a seller listing. The listing will not have an `id` and will not actually be created on the viagogo marketplace.
Creates a preview of an update to a seller listing. The updates will not actually be applied to the listing on the viagogo marketplace.

post.summary: Preview a seller listing for a requested event
post.description: Creates a preview of a seller listing for an event requested by the current user. The listing will not have an `id` and will not actually be created on the viagogo marketplace.

code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code that identifies the currency.

symbol.description: The symbol that identifies the currency.

decimal_places.description: The number of decimal places used to represent amounts in the currency.

Category.description: A Category represents a grouping of events or other categories. Examples are Concerts, Rock and Pop and Lady Gaga.

description_html.description: The localized string containing HTML markup that describes the category.

min_ticket_price.description: The minimum ticket price of the events in this category.

min_event_date.description: The earliest start date of the events in this category.

max_event_date.description: The latest start date of the events in this category.

Money.description: Returned for monetary values, such as ticket prices, fees charged and tax amounts.

amount.description: The decimal amount of the money.

currency_code.description: The ISO 4217 currency code that the monetary value is represented in.

display.description: A user-friendly string representing the monetary value.

category:children.description: The direct descendants of this category.

category:performers.description: The leaf descendants this category. These categories will be direct parents of events.

category:webpage.description: The webpage on the viagogo website for this category.

top_children.description: A preview of the categories that are direct children of this category.

top_events.description: The most popular events in this category.

top_performers.description: The most popular performers (leaf categories) that are children of this category.

EmbeddedCategory.description: A Category represents a grouping of events or other categories. Examples are Concerts, Rock and Pop and Lady Gaga.

EmbeddedEvent.description: An event on the viagogo platform.

start_date.description: The date when the event starts.

end_date.description: The date when the event ends.

on_sale_date.description: The date when tickets for the event will go onsale.

date_confirmed.description: True if the event start and end date have been confirmed; Otherwise, false.

Event.description: An event on the viagogo platform.

start_date.description: The date when the event starts.

end_date.description: The date when the event ends.

on_sale_date.description: The date when tickets for the event will go onsale.

date_confirmed.description: True if the event start and end date have been confirmed; Otherwise, false.

min_ticket_price.description: The minimum ticket price of the event.

number_of_tickets.description: The number of tickets currently available for this event.

notes_html.description: Localized string containing HTML markup that describes the notes for the event.

restrictions_html.description: Localized string containing HTML markup that describes the purchase restrictions on the event.

affiliate_commission_tier.description: The tier of commission paid to affiliates that market this event. Can be `Normal` or `Low`.

event:category.description: The category that contains this event.

event:createsellerlisting.description: Create a SellerListing for this event.

event:listingconstraints.description: The listing constraints for this event.

event:localwebpage.description: The webpage on the local viagogo website for this event.

event:sellerlistingpreview.description: Creates a preview of a SellerListing for this event.

event:webpage.description: The webpage on the viagogo website for this event.

venue.description: The venue where the event is taking place.

EmbeddedVenue.description: A venue is a location where an event takes place.

city.description: The name of the city where the venue is located.

state_province.description: The name of the State or Province where the venue is located.

country.description: The Country where the venue is located.

code.description: The two-letter ISO 3166 code for the country.

country:events.description: The events taking place in a country.

Venue.description: A venue is a location where an event takes place.

city.description: The name of the city where the venue is located.

state_province.description: The name of the State or Province where the venue is located.

address_1.description: The first line of the address for the venue.

address_2.description: The second line of the address for the venue.

postal_code.description: The postal code for the venue.

venue:events.description: The events taking place in a venue.

venue:metroarea.description: The metro area where a venue is located.

country.description: The Country where the venue is located.

MetroArea.description: A MetroArea is a metropolitan region that contains venues where events are taking place.

name.description: The name of the metro area.

metroarea:events.description: The events taking place in a metro area.

metroarea:venues.description: The venues located in a metro area.

Listing.description: A set of tickets for sale on the viagogo marketplace.

number_of_tickets.description: The number of tickets available for purchase.

seating.description: The seating information for the ticket(s) in this listing.

pickup_available.description: True if the tickets can be picked up at the event; otherwise , false.

download_available.description: True if the listing has a pre-uploaded E-Ticket; otherwise, false.

ticket_price.description: The price of each ticket in the listing in the currency that they were listed in.

estimated_ticket_price.description: The estimated price of each ticket in the currency requested by the client.

estimated_total_ticket_price.description: The estimated total price for all tickets in the currency requested by the client.

estimated_booking_fee.description: The estimated booking fee applied when the tickets are purchased, in the currency requested by the client.

estimated_shipping.description: The estimated shipping charge applied when the tickets are purchased, in the currency requested by the client.

estimated_vat.description: The estimated VAT charge applied when the tickets are purchased, in the currency requested by the client.

estimated_total_charge.description: The estimated total charge applied when the tickets are purchased, in the currency requested by the client.

Seating.description: Represents the seating information for a ticket(s) in a Venue.

seat_from.description: The first in a contiguous block of seats to which the tickets have been allocated.

seat_to.description: The last in a contiguous block of seats to which the tickets have been allocated.

listing:localwebpage.description: The webpage on the local viagogo website where a listing can be purchased.

listing:sellerlisting.description: The associated SellerListing for the listing, if it belongs to the currently authenticated user.

listing:webpage.description: The webpage on the viagogo website for this listing.

listing_notes.description: The listing notes for this listing.

ticket_type.description: The type of ticket(s) in this listing.

ListingNote.description: Provides additional notes on a listing

SearchResult.description: A SearchResult resource represents a single result of a search.

title.description: The localized name of the search result.

type.description: The type of the search result. Can be `Event`, `Category`, `Venue` or `MetroArea`.

type_description.description: The localized text describing the type of the search result.

searchresult:category.description: The category that a search result represents.

searchresult:event.description: The event that a search result represents.

searchresult:metroarea.description: The metro area that a search result represents.

searchresult:venue.description: The venue that a search result represents.

category.description: The category that a search result represents.

event.description: The event that a search result represents.

genre.description: The genre of the category that a search result represents.

metro_area.description: The metro area that a search result represents.

venue.description: The venue that a search result represents.

ApiRoot.description: The root of the viagogo API service. Applications can use the links provided by this resource to find all other resources in the API.

viagogo:createsellerlisting.description: Create a seller listing for an event.

viagogo:genres.description: The top-level categories that group all other categories and events.

viagogo:listingconstraints.description: The listing constraints for a requested event.

viagogo:search.description: Search for events, categories, venues and metro areas.

full_name.description: The full name of the user.

email.description: The email address of the user.

primary_phone.description: The primary phone number of the user.

email_optin.description: True if the user is signed up for the viagogo email newsletter; otherwise, false.

user:addresses.description: The collection of Addresses associated with this user.

user:paymentmethods.description: The collection of PaymentMethods associated with this user.

user:sales.description: The collection of Sales associated with this user.

user:salesaggregates.description: The aggregated sales data associated with this user.

user:sellerlistings.description: The collection of SellerListings associated with this user.

user:update.description: Update the settings for this user.

user:webhooks.description: The collection of Webhooks associated with this user.

SellerListing.description: A set of tickets for sale on the viagogo marketplace that belong to the currently authenticated user.

created_at.description: The date when the listing was created.

number_of_tickets.description: The number of tickets available for purchase.

seating.description: The seating information for the ticket(s) in this listing.

display_seating.description: The seating information that will be displayed to buyers for the ticket(s) in this listing.

ticket_price.description: The price of each ticket in the listing.

updated_at.description: The date when the listing was last updated.

external_id.description: An identifier that has been assigned to the listing in an external inventory management system.

expires_at.description: The date when the listing will be automatically unpublished from the marketplace.

display_number_of_tickets.description: The number of tickets that should be displayed to buyers as available for purchase.

face_value.description: The price printed on the ticket, not including any booking fees.

ticket_proceeds.description: The amount that the seller will receive for each ticket sold.

in_hand_at.description: The date when the seller will have the tickets in hand.

barcodes.description: Barcode(s) for the ticket(s) in this listing.

purchase_price_per_ticket.description: The purchase price paid by the seller for each ticket in the listing.

total_purchase_price.description: The total purchase price paid by the seller.

sales_tax_paid.description: True if the seller already paid sales tax for the ticket(s); otherwise, false.

BarcodeInformation.description: A set of barcodes for a seat.

seat_ordinal.description: An ordinal number for a seat.

sellerlisting:constraints.description: The constraints applied to this listing.

sellerlisting:lmsoptin.description: Opt this listing into Last Minute Sales.

sellerlisting:lmsoptout.description: Opt this listing out of Last Minute Sales.

sellerlisting:lmspickup.description: The pickup instructions for Last Minute Sales.

sellerlisting:optionalverificationreques.description:
The VerificationRequests that can be resolved in order for the
listing to be published on some viagogo websites.

sellerlisting:publish.description: Make seller listing available for purchase.

sellerlisting:ticketlocation.description: The address where the ticket(s) are located.

sellerlisting:unpublish.description: Make the listing unavailable for purchase.

sellerlisting:updatefacevalue.description: Update face value for this listing.

sellerlisting:updateinhandat.description: Update the date the seller will have tickets for this listing in hand.

sellerlisting:updatenumberoftickets.description: Update number of tickets available for purchase.

sellerlisting:updateseating.description: Update the seating information for the ticket(s) in this listing.

sellerlisting:updatesplittype.description: Update the way the ticket(s) are allowed to be split up when sold.

sellerlisting:updateticketlocation.description: Update the address where the ticket(s) are located.

sellerlisting:updateticketprice.description: Update the price of each ticket in this listing.

sellerlisting:updatetickettype.description: Update the type of ticket(s) for this listing.

sellerlisting:verificationrequests.description:
The VerificationRequests that must be resolved in order for the
listing to be published on all viagogo websites.

constraints.description: The constraints applied to this listing.

split_type.description: The way that the ticket(s) are allowed to be split up when sold.

ticket_type.description: The type of ticket(s) in this listing.

venue.description: The venue where the event is taking place.

ListingConstraints.description: The constraints applied to a listing for a particular event on the viagogo marketplace.

min_number_of_tickets.description: The minimum number of tickets available for purchase.

max_number_of_tickets.description: The maximum number of tickets available for purchase.

ticket_location_required.description: True if a ticket location is required for tickets; Otherwise, false.

seats_required.description: True if seat-level information (seat_to and seat_from) is required; Otherwise, false.

sections.description: The valid section and row information. If no sections are specified then any text will be accepted for section and row.

currencies.description: The valid currencies for the listing ticket price.

listing_notes.description: The available notes for this listing.

split_types.description: The way that tickets are allowed to be split up when sold.

SplitType.description: The way that the ticket(s) in a listing are allowed to be split up when sold.

type.description: The type of split. Can be Any, None, AvoidOne, AvoidOneAndThree, or Pairs.

name.description: The localised name of the type of split.

description.description: The localised description of the split.

listing_note_ids.description: An array of listing note identifiers that provides additional notes on the listing

in_hand_at.description: The date when the seller will have the tickets in hand.

external_id.description: An identifier that has been assigned to the listing in an external inventory management system.

notes.description: A comma-separated string of additional notes about the listing

published.description: True when the listing should be published; Otherwise, false.

lms_optin.description: True when the listing should be opted into Last Minute Sales; Otherwise, false.

eticket_ids.description: A array of the identifiers of the E-Tickets to be assigned to the listing.

external_event_information.description: Information about the listing's event on other platforms.

purchase_price_per_ticket.description: The purchase price paid by the seller for each ticket in the listing.

total_purchase_price.description: The total purchase price paid by the seller.

sales_tax_paid.description: True if the seller already paid sales tax for the ticket(s); otherwise, false.

barcodes.description: Barcode(s) for the ticket(s) in this listing.

venue.description: The venue where the event will take place.

country.description: The country where the event will take place.

PostSellerListingRequest.description: A set of tickets for sale on the viagogo marketplace that belong to the currently authenticated user.

ticket_price.description: The price of each ticket in the listing.

ticket_proceeds.description: The amount that the seller will receive for each ticket sold.

seating.description: The seating information for the ticket(s) in this listing.

face_value.description: The price printed on the ticket, not including any booking fees.

ticket_type.description: The type of ticket(s) in this listing.

split_type.description: The way that the ticket(s) are allowed to be split up when sold.

number_of_tickets.description: The number of tickets available for purchase.

display_number_of_tickets.description: The number of tickets that should be displayed to buyers as available for purchase.

ticket_location_address_id.description: The identifier of the address where the ticket(s) are located.

listing_note_ids.description: An array of listing note identifiers that provides additional notes on the listing

in_hand_at.description: The date when the seller will have the tickets in hand.

external_id.description: An identifier that has been assigned to the listing in an external inventory management system.

notes.description: A comma-separated string of additional notes about the listing

published.description: True when the listing should be published; Otherwise, false.

lms_optin.description: True when the listing should be opted into Last Minute Sales; Otherwise, false.

eticket_ids.description: A array of the identifiers of the E-Tickets to be assigned to the listing.

external_event_information.description: Information about the listing's event on other platforms.

purchase_price_per_ticket.description: The purchase price paid by the seller for each ticket in the listing.

total_purchase_price.description: The total purchase price paid by the seller.

sales_tax_paid.description: True if the seller already paid sales tax for the ticket(s); otherwise, false.

barcodes.description: Barcode(s) for the ticket(s) in this listing.

venue.description: The venue where the event will take place.

country.description: The country where the event will take place.

SellerEvent.description: An event on the viagogo marketplace with listings that belong to the currently authenticated user.

start_date.description: The date when the event starts.

end_date.description: The date when the event ends.

on_sale_date.description: The date when tickets for the event will go onsale.

date_confirmed.description: True if the event start and end date have been confirmed; Otherwise, false.

lms.description: True if the event is a last minute sale event; otherwise, false.

sellerevent:createsellerlisting.description: Create listing for the currently authenticated user.

sellerevent:sellerlistings.description: Event listings that belong to the currently authenticated user.

sales_aggregates.description: The currently authenticated user's aggregated sales data for this event.

SalesAggregate.description: Aggregated sales data for the currently authenticated user.

number_of_sales.description: The total number of sales aggregated in this resource.

proceeds.description: The total amount that the seller will receive for the sale.

number_of_tickets.description: The total number of tickets for the sales aggregated in this resource.

status.description: A short localised string describing the current status of the aggregated sales.

salesaggregate:sales.description: The sales aggregated in this resource.

Shipments.description:
The Shipments resource is a collection resource that contains zero or
more references to a set of shipments, and links that guide you on ways
to interact with the shipments. The collection offers a paginated view
of shipments.

shipment:create.description: Creates a new shipment for the ticket(s).

Shipment.description: A shipment of one or more tickets by a seller.

tracking_number.description: The identifier used to track the shipment of the ticket(s).

delivery_address.description: The address that the seller must ship the tickets to.

delivery_method.description: The delivery method for the ticket(s).

pickup_addresses.description: The addresses where courier pickups could be arranged.

pickups.description: The courier pickups that have been scheduled.

type.description: The type of delivery method. Can be ETicket, Post or Pickup.

name.description: The localised name of the delivery method.

description.description: The localised description of the delivery method.

deliverymethod:logo.description: An image file containing the logo for the delivery method.

Address2.description: An address is a delivery, pickup or billing address associated with the current user.

full_name.description: The full name of the recipient.

default.description: True if the address is the users default address; Otherwise, false.

address_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_2.description: The second line of the address.

address_3.description: The third line of the address.

city.description: The name of the city where the address is located.

state_province.description: The name of the State or Province where the address is located.

postal_code.description: The postal code for the address.

address:carrier.description: The pickup windows available for Carrier collection.

address:update.description: Update the details of the current users address.

country.description: The Country where the address is located.

Pickup.description: A scheduled courier pickup for a package.

start_date.description: The earliest date that the courier will pickup the package.

end_date.description: The latest date that the courier will pickup the package.

address.description: The address where the courier will pickup the package.

carrier.description: A carrier (e.g. UPS) that will collect tickets that are to be delivered.

Carrier.description: A carrier (e.g. UPS) that will collect tickets that are to be delivered.

pickup_windows.description: The windows available for ticket collection.

PickupWindow.description: Represents a window of time when a courier pickup can be arranged.

start_date.description: The date when the window starts.

end_date.description: The date when the window ends.

carrier:createpickup.description: Creates a new pickup for the ticket(s).

tracking_number.description: The identifier used to track the shipment of the ticket(s).

ETicketUpload.description: Represents an uploaded file that contains one or more E-Tickets.

file_name.description: The name of the file that was uploaded.

processed_at.description: The date when all of the E-Tickets in the uploaded file were processed.

original_number_of_etickets.description: The original number of E-Tickets contained in the uploaded file.

status_description.description: A localised in-depth description of the current status of the upload.

eticketupload:document.description: The original file that was uploaded.

etickets.description: An array of the individual E-Tickets contained in the uploaded files.

ETicket.description: An electronic ticket that has been uploaded for a listing or a sale.

eticket:document.description: A PDF file containing the E-Ticket.

eticket:thumbnail.description: An image file containing a thumbnail of the E-Ticket.

ETickets2.description:
The ETickets resource is a collection resource that contains zero or
more references to a set of E-Tickets, and links that guide you on
ways to interact with the E-Tickets. The collection offers a paginated
view of E-Tickets.

Sale.description: A sale on the viagogo marketplace that belongs to the currently authenticated user.

created_at.description: The date when the sale was created.

seating.description: The seating information for the ticket(s) that have been sold.

proceeds.description: The total amount that the seller will receive for the sale.

number_of_tickets.description: The number of tickets that have been sold.

status.description: A short localised string describing the current status of the sale.

status_description.description: A localised in-depth description of the current status of the sale.

display_proceeds.description: The total amount that the seller will receive for the sale.

confirm_by.description: The date by which the seller must confirm the sale.

ship_by.description: The date by which the seller must ship the tickets.

external_listing_id.description: The listing identifier assigned by an external system, typically generated by the seller's inventory management software.

in_hand_at.description: The date and time that the seller has the tickets 'in hand' to deliver to the buyer.

sale:autotrackshipment.description: The webpage where a shipment of tickets can be tracked automatically.

sale:etickets.description: The uploaded E-Tickets that have been assigned to the tickets that have been sold.

sale:eticketuploads.description: The uploaded files containing E-Tickets that have not been assigned to the tickets that have been sold.

sale:reject.description: Report a problem with the sale.

sale:saveetickets.description: Assign uploaded E-Tickets to the tickets that have been sold.

sale:shipments.description: The shipments related to a sale.

sale:trackshipment.description: The webpage where a shipment of tickets can be tracked after entering the tracking_number.

delivery_method.description: The delivery method for the ticket(s).

ticket_type.description: The type of ticket(s) that was sold.

venue.description: The venue where the event is taking place.

PatchSaleRequest.description: A sale on the viagogo marketplace that belongs to the currently authenticated user.

confirmed.description: True when the sale should be confirmed; Otherwise, false.

eticket_ids.description: A array of the identifiers of the E-Tickets to be assigned to the sale.

change_paper_ticket_to_eticket.description: True when the ticket(s) should be changed from paper to E-ticket; Otherwise, false.

confirm_same_day_shipment.description: True when same-day shipment is confirmed; Otherwise, false

in_hand_at.description: The date and time that the seller has the tickets 'in hand' to deliver to the buyer.

tracking_number.description: Tacking number of the ticket shipment.

Payment.description: A payment on the viagogo marketplace that belongs to the currently authenticated user.

created_at.description: Date when the payment was created.

number_of_sales.description: Total number of sales associated to the payment.

payment_amount.description: Net amount the user will receive in this payment.

credits.description: Non-proceeds credits applied to the user's account, paid out in this payment.

charges.description: Charges applied to the user's account, settled in this payment.

proceeds.description: Money owed to the user from sale(s) of a ticket(s), paid out in this payment.

payment_method.description: Payment method that will be used for the payments or charges.

details.description: The obfuscated details of the payment method

PaymentSale.description: A sale related to a payment that belongs to the currently authenticated user.

proceeds.description: Money owed to the user from this sale.

charges.description: Charges, related to this sale, that are applied to the user's account.

credits.description: Non-proceeds credits, related to this sale, that are applied to the user's account.

sale.description: A sale associated with a payment.

venue.description: The venue where the event is taking place.

created_at.description: The date when the sale was created.

seating.description: The seating information for the ticket(s) that have been sold.

proceeds.description: The total amount that the seller will receive for the sale.

number_of_tickets.description: The number of tickets that have been sold.

Webhook.description:
A webhook is a subscription from a server application to certain topics
on the viagogo platform. When an occurrence of a topic is triggered,
well POST a payload to the webhooks configured url.

created_at.description: The date when the webhook was created.

topics.description: An array of the topics the webhook is trigger for.

url.description: The server endpoint that will receive the webhook payload.

authorization_header.description: The Authorization header value that should be included in requests to the webhook.

webhook:update.description: Update the details of a webhook.

url.description: The server endpoint that will receive the webhook payload.

authorization_header.description: The Authorization header value that should be included in requests to the webhook.

topics.description: An array of the topics the webhook is trigger for.

url.description: The server endpoint that will receive the webhook payload.

authorization_header.description: The Authorization header value that should be included in requests to the webhook.

topics.description: An array of the topics the webhook is trigger for.

Addresses.description:
The Addresses resource is a collection resource that contains zero or
more references to a set of addresses, and links that guide you on ways
to interact with the addresses. The collection offers a paginated view
of addresses.

address:create.description: Add a new address for the current user.

PostAddressRequest.description: An address is a delivery, pickup or billing address associated with the current user.

full_name.description: The full name of the recipient.

default.description: True if the address is the current user's default address; Otherwise, false.

address_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_2.description: The second line of the address.

address_3.description: The third line of the address.

city.description: The name of the city where the address is located.

state_province.description: The name of the State or Province where the address is located.

postal_code.description: The postal code for the address.

country_code.description: The 2 character ISO code that identifies the country in which the address is located.

PatchAddressRequest.description: An address is a delivery, pickup or billing address associated with the current user.

full_name.description: The full name of the recipient.

default.description: True if the address is the current user's default address; Otherwise, false.

address_1.description: The first line of the address.

address_2.description: The second line of the address.

address_3.description: The third line of the address.

city.description: The name of the city where the address is located.

state_province.description: The name of the State or Province where the address is located.

postal_code.description: The postal code for the address.

country_code.description: The 2 character ISO code that identifies the country in which the address is located.

PaymentMethods.description:
The PaymentMethods resource is a collection resource that contains zero
or more references to a set of payment methods, and links that guide you
on ways to interact with the payment methods. The collection offers a
paginated view of payment methods.

paymentmethod:createcreditcard.description: Adds a new credit card for the current user.

paymentmethod:createpaypal.description: Adds a new PayPal account for the current user.

PaymentMethod.description: A method to send or receive payment.

details.description: The obfuscated details of the payment method.

type.description: The type of the payment method.

type_description.description: A localised string describing the type of payment method.

buyer_method.description: True if the payment method can be used for purchasing listings; otherwise, false.

default_buyer_method.description: True if the payment method is the users default payment method for purchasing listings.

seller_method.description: True if the payment method can be used for receiving payments; otherwise, false.

default_seller_method.description: True if the payment method is the users default payment method for receiving payments.

paymentmethod:delete.description: Delete the current users payment method.

paymentmethod:updatecreditcard.description: Update the current users credit card details.

paymentmethod:updatedefaults.description: Update the default payment methods for the current user.

paymentmethod:updatepaypal.description: Update the current users PayPal details.

billing_address.description: The billing address for this payment method.

type_details.description: The type details for this payment method.

full_name.description: The full name of the user.

email_optin.description: True if the user is signed up for the viagogo email newsletter; otherwise, false.

full_name.description: The full name of the user.

email_optin.description: True if the user is signed up for the viagogo email newsletter; otherwise, false.

full_name.description: The full name of the user.

email_optin.description: True if the user is signed up for the viagogo email newsletter; otherwise, false.

requires_authentication.description: Authentication credentials were missing or incorrect.

not_found.description: The URI requested is invalid or the resource requested, such as an event, does not exist.

forbidden.description: The request is understood, but it has been refused or access is not allowed. An accompanying error message will explain why.

validation_failed.description: The request data is not valid. errors will contain an object with a localized message that describes the validation error for each property of the data.

fields.description: A comma-separated list of the name(s) of the field(s) to be returned.

embed.description: Optional embedded resources are only included in a resource when your application includes the embedded property name(s) as a comma-separated value in the embed parameter.

scopes.(no scope): Grants read-only access to public information like events, listings.
scopes.read:user: Grants read-only access to the user's account information, addresses, payment methods, purchases and sales.
scopes.write:user: Grants write access to the users account information, addresses, payment methods and sales.
scopes.write:purchases: Grants write access to the users purchases. This allows users to use your application to purchase listings.
scopes.read:sellerlistings: Grants read access to the users listings.
scopes.write:sellerlistings: Grants write access to the users listings. This allows users to use your application to create and update listings.
scopes.read:webhooks: Grants read access to the users webhooks.
scopes.write:webhooks: Grants write access to the users webhooks.
scopes.write:requestedevents: Grants write access to the users requested events. This allows users to use your application to request an event to be added to the viagogo platform.
scopes.read:payment: Grants read-only access to the user's payments
scopes.read:sales: Grants read-only access to the user's sales.
scopes.write:sales: Grants write access to the user's sales. This allows users to use your application to confirm and fulfill sales.

scopes.(no scope): Grants read-only access to public information like events, listings.

scopes.write:user: Grants write access to the users account information, addresses, payment methods and sales.

scopes.read:sellerlistings: Grants read access to the users listings.

scopes.read:webhooks: Grants read access to the users webhooks.
scopes.write:webhooks: Grants write access to the users webhooks.
scopes.write:requestedevents: Grants write access to the users requested events. This allows users to use your application to request an event to be added to the viagogo platform.
scopes.read:payment: Grants read-only access to the user's payments
scopes.read:sales: Grants read-only access to the user's sales.
scopes.write:sales: Grants write access to the user's sales. This allows users to use your application to confirm and fulfill sales.

tags.name: Sales
tags.description: View your sales details and fulfill your sales.

tags.name: SellerListings
tags.description: List tickets, update your listings and search your inventory.
